title: Six Bedroom House for Sale in Dehiwala
details:
Spacious architect designed house which can be split and used as two units if preferred. The house offers extensive living space along with a total of six bedrooms and four bathrooms. Conveniently located in Ediriweera Avenue [Sea Side], Dehiwala, only 300m from Dehiwala Junction and 30m from proposed Marine Drive.

The property has been maintained to a high standard throughout and benefits from fully tiled floors, two spacious pantries fitted with teak cupboards, British bathroom fittings and a large rooftop terrace offering pleasant sea and city views. A well configured & designed family house in a convenient residential location.

- Two unit house with separate assessment numbers, electricity, water & sewage lines.
- Six bedrooms, four bathrooms. Two bedrooms are en suite.
- Two spacious living & dining rooms, one for each unit.
- Teak fitted pantry cupboards, teak doors and windows.
- Front and back garden.
- Separate maids bathroom.
- One car covered indoor garage. Provision for second car parking within premises.

Price negotiable upon inspection.

Viewings can be arranged by prior appointment only.
